title: Process collection type data

rows: Data source type. If you omit the value, Creatio will use thecrt.EntityDataSourcetype.
The name of the entity schema. Parameter of the data source type.
The list of attributes to load. Parameter of the data source type.
tables.html:
Parameter

Parameter description

primaryDataSourceName

The data source name

type

Data source type. If you omit the value, Creatio will use the crt.EntityDataSource type.

entitySchemaName

The name of the entity schema. Parameter of the data source type.

attributes

The list of attributes to load. Parameter of the data source type.

rows: The root schema column that connects the root schema to parent root schema. TherelationPathproperty contains the parent root schema column.
The parent root schema column that connects the parent root schema to the root schema. TheattributePathproperty contains the root schema column.
tables.html:
Property

Property description

attributePath

The root schema column that connects the root schema to parent root schema. The relationPath property contains the parent root schema column.

relationPath

The parent root schema column that connects the parent root schema to the root schema. The attributePath property contains the root schema column.

rows: Name of the column by which to sort data.
tables.html:
Property

Property description

columnName

Name of the column by which to sort data.

direction

Sorting order. Available values: asc (ascending), desc (descending).

headings.text: Data filtering based on data from another data source​

parameters.name: type
parameters.type: Data source type. If you omit the value, Creatio will use thecrt.EntityDataSourcetype.

parameters.name: entitySchemaName
parameters.type: The name of the entity schema. Parameter of the data source type.

parameters.name: attributes
parameters.type: The list of attributes to load. Parameter of the data source type.
